structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: City, consolidated local government, or urban-county aid.
law.text: A city, consolidated local government, or urban-county shall have the power to aid an agency in any manner provided for aid by public bodies to urban renewal and community development agencies by KRS 99.410.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 126, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 11.
